body.release:
Updated to latest versions of intenz-core - which fixes ENZYME URLS - intenz-database, intenz-ffwriter, and biobabel-citations (overriding transitive dependency from rhea-domain to fix problems retrieving citations).
< Preliminary Rhea reactions are now clearly labeled.

release.action: Added configuration to web.xml to allow filtering of URLs requested by the load balancer, not to register in the access log.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, intenz-mapper, intenz-ffwriter, rhea-domain and biobabel-core.
Removed unused dependency (biobabel-citations).
Updated to latest versions of intenz-ffwriter, rhea-domain, biobabel-core and biobabel-citations.
Fixed trigger of property change when the Rhea data source is changed (via JMX, for example), so that statistics are automatically updated.
The IntEnzConfig MBean is now deregistered with application undeployment.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-core, intenz-database - which introduces a hack to avoid long wait for statistics retrieval - and intenz-ffwriter.
Fixed news block to get them from the SF RSS feed.
Added xalan dependency for the above item.
Updated to latest versions of mapper, ffwriter, rhea-domain and oracle driver (11g).
Added class IntEnzConfig to hold configuration parameters for the application. It is exported as MBean for JMX management.
Reorganised properties in different files and directories.
Removed IntEnzConnectionPool. Now a data source from the container will be used.
Updated to latest version of mapper and ffwriter.
Updated to latest version of dependencies: core, mapper, ffwriter, rhea-domain, biobabel-core, bioabel-webapp and biobabel-citations.
Updated to latest version of dependencies: mapper, ffwriter, rhea-domain and oracle.
In addition to the last release: 1 subsubclasse. 25 enzyme entries (from ENZYMES). 27 enzyme entries (from ID2EC). 1 synonym was removed.
The webapp was pointing to a non-existant properties file.
Updated to latest version of intenz-ffwriter, rhea-domain, commons-collections and javax.mail.
Removed redundant - and sometimes wrong - line with info on trasferred entries.
Removed sitemap file (will be out of the war file).
Added google site verification as a meta tag.
Fixed xrefs links titles, which showed too many white space (line feeds) in Safari.
Fixed mispelling of 'Committee'.
Updated to latest version of intenz-mapper.
Updated to latest version of intenz-ffwriter.
Updated to latest version of intenz-ffwriter.
Updated to latest version of intenz-core, intenz-mapper and intenz-ffwriter.
Added a search command for listing preliminary EC numbers.
Updated to latest version of intenz-core and biobabel-core.
Fixed bug in Rhea reaction representation.
Remapped Rhea reactions (no xrefs to undefined directions any more, replaced by bidirectional counterpart). [This is a fix in the database, actually, not in the webapp]
Updated to latest version of ffwriter.
Added Rhea cross-references to the IntEnzXML export (part of the intenz-export module, actually).
Added support for preliminary EC numbers.
Added Rhea identifiers to the text index (part of the intenz-dbIndexing module, actually).
Removed IUBMB view and proposed entries list.
Reorganised files. First release as open source.
Fixed problem with the tag file rendering linked cofactors.
Updated to latest version of ffwriter - which adds a list of exceptions to DE line for transferred and deleted entries - and biobabel.citations modules.
Updated to latest ffwriter version - which adds a new exception to DE line for a transferred entry -, mapper - which fixes issue with database cursors - and xchars-taglib.
Fixed the URL for spotlight images taken from PDBe (formerly MSD) website.
Added Rhea reactions whenever available and public.
Added BioPAX export format to the downloads area.
Showing missing enzyme name qualifiers (misprint, incorrect).
Sending help and error messages to the right recipients.
Updated to latest ffwriter version, which adds a new exception to DE line for a transferred entry.
Updated dependencies in order to use latest xchars configuration and correct UniProt URLs.
Fixed NullPointerException when there are no results.
Fixed search results list: if searching for an EC number and there are more than one result, the exact match is first in the list, and highlighted.
First release with a mavenized webapp. Using Rhea packages. Cofactors linked to ChEBI.
